%%sql
-- First step is to work out the data in standardised that we need to move to harmonised
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_appeals_event
AS
SELECT
    CONCAT(raw.casenumber, '-',raw.eventId) AS eventId
    ,raw.caseReference
    ,raw.eventType
    ,raw.eventName
    ,raw.eventstatus
    ,raw.isUrgent
    ,raw.eventPublished
    ,raw.eventStartDatetime
    ,raw.eventEndDatetime
    ,raw.notificationOfSitevisit
    ,raw.AddressLine1
    ,raw.AddressLine2
    ,raw.AddressTown
    ,raw.AddressCounty
    ,raw.AddressPostcode
    ,0 AS Migrated
    ,'Horizon' AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,9 AS SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
    ,raw.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
                IFNULL(raw.eventId,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.caseReference,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.eventtype,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.eventname,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.eventstatus,'.')
                ,IFNULL(CAST(raw.isurgent AS String),'.')
                ,IFNULL(CAST(raw.eventpublished AS String),'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.eventstartdatetime,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.eventenddatetime,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.notificationofsitevisit,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.addressLine1,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.addressLine2,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.addressTown,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.addressCounty,'.')
                ,IFNULL(raw.addressPostcode,'.')
    )) AS RowID
   ,CASE
        WHEN From_ODT.eventId IS NOT NULL THEN
           'N' -- Service bus is the master, never overwrite data that has come from that source. Not going this means we will end up in a perminant update process between ODT and Horizon - or updating data that should be updated in ODT not Horizon
        WHEN Newer_record.eventID IS NOT NULL THEN
            'N' -- Never overwrite newer data sets
        ELSE
            'Y'
    END AS IsActive
FROM 
    odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_event AS raw
    INNER JOIN (
                SELECT -- Get only the latest data for cases that haven't been migrated
                    Horizon.casenumber
                    ,Horizon.eventId
                    ,MAX(Horizon.ingested_datetime) AS Last_update
                FROM
                    odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_event AS Horizon
                GROUP BY
                    Horizon.casenumber
                    ,Horizon.eventId) AS Dedupe
        ON raw.casenumber = Dedupe.casenumber
        AND raw.casenumber = Dedupe.casenumber
        AND raw.ingested_datetime = Dedupe.Last_update
    LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT 
                        Target.eventId 
                    FROM 
                       odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
                    WHERE 
                        Target.ODTSourceSystem = 'ODT') AS From_ODT
        ON CONCAT(raw.casenumber, '-',raw.eventId) = From_ODT.eventId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT  
                        Target.eventId 
                        ,MAX(IngestionDate) AS Latest_Record
                    FROM 
                        odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
                    WHERE 
                       Target.ODTSourceSystem = 'Horizon' 
                    GROUP BY
                        Target.eventId) AS Newer_record
        ON CONCAT(raw.casenumber, '-',raw.eventId) = Newer_record.eventId
        AND raw.ingested_datetime < Newer_record.Latest_Record

%%sql
-- Need to add next step of working out if we have an insert or an update and handling appropriately. For updates need to also set isActive to N on existing records
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_Event_Delta
AS
SELECT -- Step 1: Identify net new records
    raw.eventId
    ,raw.caseReference
    ,raw.eventType
    ,raw.eventName
    ,raw.eventstatus
    ,raw.isUrgent
    ,raw.eventPublished
    ,raw.eventStartDatetime
    ,raw.eventEndDatetime
    ,raw.notificationOfSitevisit
    ,raw.AddressLine1
    ,raw.AddressLine2
    ,raw.AddressTown
    ,raw.AddressCounty
    ,raw.AddressPostcode
    ,raw.Migrated
    ,raw.ODTSourceSystem
    ,raw.SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
    ,raw.IngestionDate
    ,raw.ValidTo
    ,raw.RowID
    ,raw.IsActive
    ,'Insert' AS UpdateMode
FROM
    vw_Horizon_appeals_event AS raw
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
        ON raw.eventId = Target.eventId
WHERE
    Target.eventId IS NULL
UNION -- Using union to deal with interdupes
SELECT -- Step 2: Identify records that are updates
    raw.eventId
    ,raw.caseReference
    ,raw.eventType
    ,raw.eventName
    ,raw.eventstatus
    ,raw.isUrgent
    ,raw.eventPublished
    ,raw.eventStartDatetime
    ,raw.eventEndDatetime
    ,raw.notificationOfSitevisit
    ,raw.AddressLine1
    ,raw.AddressLine2
    ,raw.AddressTown
    ,raw.AddressCounty
    ,raw.AddressPostcode
    ,raw.Migrated
    ,raw.ODTSourceSystem
    ,raw.SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
    ,raw.IngestionDate
    ,raw.ValidTo
    ,raw.RowID
    ,raw.IsActive
    ,'Update' AS UpdateMode
FROM
    vw_Horizon_appeals_event AS raw
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
        ON raw.eventId = Target.eventId
        AND raw.RowID <> Target.RowID
        AND raw.IsActive = 'Y' -- Only care about updates for records that are active as we could have older records we've never seen before
        AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'
UNION -- Using union to deal with interdupes
SELECT -- Step 3: Bring records in to archive
    Target.eventId
    ,Target.caseReference
    ,Target.eventType
    ,Target.eventName
    ,Target.eventstatus
    ,CAST(Target.isUrgent AS boolean) AS isUrgent
    ,CAST(Target.eventPublished AS boolean) AS eventPublished
    ,Target.eventStartDatetime
    ,Target.eventEndDatetime
    ,Target.notificationOfSitevisit
    ,Target.AddressLine1
    ,Target.AddressLine2
    ,Target.AddressTown
    ,Target.AddressCounty
    ,Target.AddressPostcode
    ,Target.Migrated
    ,Target.ODTSourceSystem
    ,Target.SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
    ,Target.IngestionDate
    ,to_timestamp(date_sub(raw.IngestionDate,1)) AS ValidTo
    ,Target.RowID
    ,'N' AS IsActive
    ,'Update' AS UpdateMode
FROM
    vw_Horizon_appeals_event AS raw
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
        ON raw.eventId = Target.eventId
        AND raw.RowID <> Target.RowID
        AND raw.IsActive = 'Y' -- Only care about updates for records that are active as we could have older records we've never seen before
        AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'
UNION
SELECT -- Lastly deal with new versions of existing events
    raw.eventId
    ,raw.caseReference
    ,raw.eventType
    ,raw.eventName
    ,raw.eventstatus
    ,raw.isUrgent
    ,raw.eventPublished
    ,raw.eventStartDatetime
    ,raw.eventEndDatetime
    ,raw.notificationOfSitevisit
    ,raw.AddressLine1
    ,raw.AddressLine2
    ,raw.AddressTown
    ,raw.AddressCounty
    ,raw.AddressPostcode
    ,raw.Migrated
    ,raw.ODTSourceSystem
    ,raw.SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
    ,raw.IngestionDate
    ,raw.ValidTo
    ,raw.RowID
    ,raw.IsActive
    ,'Insert' AS UpdateMode
FROM
   odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
    INNER JOIN vw_Horizon_appeals_event AS raw
        ON Target.eventId = raw.eventId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Perm
        ON raw.eventId = Perm.eventId
        AND raw.RowID = Perm.RowID
WHERE
    Perm.eventId IS NULL

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event AS Target 
USING vw_Horizon_Event_Delta AS Raw
    ON Target.eventId = Raw.eventId
    AND Target.RowID = Raw.RowID
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
    UPDATE
    SET
        Target.ValidTo = raw.ValidTo,
        Target.IsActive = 'N'
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (eventId
            ,caseReference
            ,eventType
            ,eventName
            ,eventstatus
            ,isUrgent
            ,eventPublished
            ,eventStartDatetime
            ,eventEndDatetime
            ,notificationOfSitevisit
            ,AddressLine1
            ,AddressLine2
            ,AddressTown
            ,AddressCounty
            ,AddressPostcode
            ,Migrated
            ,ODTSourceSystem
            ,SourceSystemID 
            ,IngestionDate
            ,ValidTo
            ,RowID
            ,IsActive)
    VALUES  (raw.eventId
            ,raw.caseReference
            ,raw.eventType
            ,raw.eventName
            ,raw.eventstatus
            ,raw.isUrgent
            ,raw.eventPublished
            ,raw.eventStartDatetime
            ,raw.eventEndDatetime
            ,raw.notificationOfSitevisit
            ,raw.AddressLine1
            ,raw.AddressLine2
            ,raw.AddressTown
            ,raw.AddressCounty
            ,raw.AddressPostcode
            ,raw.Migrated
            ,raw.ODTSourceSystem
            ,raw.SourceSystemID 
            ,raw.IngestionDate
            ,raw.ValidTo
            ,raw.RowID
            ,raw.IsActive)

%%sql
-- Fix identity column
INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AppealsEventId NULLS LAST) AS AppealsEventId
    ,eventId
    ,caseReference
    ,eventType
    ,eventName
    ,eventstatus
    ,isUrgent
    ,eventPublished
    ,eventStartDatetime
    ,eventEndDatetime
    ,notificationOfSitevisit
    ,AddressLine1
    ,AddressLine2
    ,AddressTown
    ,AddressCounty
    ,AddressPostcode
    ,Migrated
    ,ODTSourceSystem
    ,SourceSystemID 
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,RowID
    ,IsActive
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event;
